featured.text: Some critics have said that MOOCs promote an unrealistic one-size-fits-all model of higher education and that there is no replacement for true dialogues between professors and their students.
mistake found in parenthood is that parents often set unrealistic goals for their children.

definition.zh_def: 不切實際的；不符合現實的
definition.en_def: Not realistic; not based on or reflecting the actual situation.
definition.example: Her expectations for the project were unrealistic given the limited budget.
